title: SkillSpring - AI-Powered Career Guidance System
description: Built a comprehensive AI-powered career guidance and personalized learning platform using FastAPI backend with Groq LLM integration, Cohere embeddings, and Supabase database. Features intelligent PDF processing, LLM-powered content generation (summaries, quizzes, flashcards, micro-lessons), career matching with skill gap analysis, personalized roadmap generation, and a modern frontend deployed on Vercel. Implements RAG architecture, vector search with pgvector, and sophisticated recommendation systems for career development.

title: Multimodal Fashion Recommendation Engine
description: Built a production-ready fashion recommendation engine using OpenAI's CLIP for joint image-text embeddings. Integrated DensePose segmentation, hybrid search with FAISS, and adaptive reranking for relevance. Designed clean, modular CLI with masked pre-processing and personalized discovery at scale.

title: End-to-End Stock Forecasting – Tesla (TSLA)
description: Developed a forecasting pipeline combining technical indicators (RSI, MACD, GARCH, OBV) and FinBERT sentiment scores. Trained and tuned Random Forest, XGBoost, and LSTM-GRU hybrids using Optuna, achieving <2% MAPE. Deployed with walk-forward retraining and modular CLI for real-time use.

title: Legal Case Summarisation Pipeline
description: Scraped and summarized 250k+ Dutch legal rulings with structured chunking and OpenAI summarization (o3-mini, o1). Implemented retry logic, date filtering, and CSV exports. Designed batch pipelines and CLI tools for scalable legal tech and civic analysis.

title: Fake News Detection – IIT (BHU) Summer Intern
description: Designed a fake news classification system using manually labeled Twitter data and fact-checking procedures. Applied Word2Vec, GloVe, and ensemble models (Random Forest, LSTM) to achieve 94% recall. Improved information quality and trust in digital content pipelines.
context: Summer intern project at IIT (BHU) Varanasi
